= Installing Sinthgunt =
This page describes how to install Sinthgunt on 
  * Ubuntu 8.10
  * Ubuntu 9.04
  * openSuse 11
  * (Planned) Debian 4
  * (Planned) Mandriva 2009.1
  * (Planned) Fedora 10
For instructions on how to install ffmpeg, please visit this [http://code.google.com/p/sinthgunt/wiki/Installation_ffmpeg page].
== Ubuntu 8.10 ==
===Installation using a .deb package===
Download that latest .deb package from this 
[http://code.google.com/p/sinthgunt/source/browse/#svn/trunk/deb folder].
Then, install Sinthgunt by issuing the command
{{{
sudo dpkg -i sinthgunt-*.deb
}}}
===Installation from source===
To install Sinthgunt,
  * Download the latest source snapshot by issuing the command
{{{
svn checkout http://sinthgunt.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sinthgunt
}}}
  * To install Sinthgunt, issue the command
{{{
sudo python setup.py install
}}}
===Running Sinthgunt===
To run Sinthgunt, type
{{{
sinthgunt.py
}}}
in a console. Then, open a video file, select a preset and press convert.
== Ubuntu 9.04 ==
See the instructions for Ubuntu 8.10.

== openSuse 11 ==
   * Add the Packman repository (eg. at [http://packman.jacobs-university.de/suse/11.0/ http://packman.jacobs-university.de/suse/11.0/]) to YaST.
   * Install some nessecary packages
{{{
yast -i python-devel ffmpeg subversion
}}}
   * Download the latest source snapshot
{{{
svn checkout http://sinthgunt.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sinthgunt
}}}
   * Install Sinthgunt by running (as root from the sinthgunt directory)
{{{
python setyp.py install
}}}
===Running Sinthgunt===
To run Sinthgunt, type
{{{
sinthgunt.py
}}}
in a console. Then, open a video file, select a preset and press convert.
